question_set_1.question: Transfers power from the engine to the wheels

question_set_2.question: A system of springs and dampers that absorb road shocks

question_set_3.question: Genuine part manufactured by the same car company
A design feature that reduces air resistance improving stability

question_set_1.question: Gypsum or plasterboards used as interior walls and ceilings
Detailed technical drawings that show the design and specifications of a building.

Local government regulations that dictate what can be built and where.

question_set_2.question: Materials used to reduce heat transfer in buildings

question_set_3.question: Sealant used to fill gaps and stop leaks or drafts
Diagonal supports in an X shape, stiffening structure against wind or shakes

question_set_1.question: An automatic electrical switch that opens to interrupt a short circuit or other fault.
Any television system with more than 625 scan lines

question_set_2.question: An optical filter used in colour digital cameras

question_set_3.question: A system that converts direct current power to alternating current, without the use of rotating machines

question_set_1.question: The process of cleaning and keeping food safe
A substance used to prepare a dish

Wrapping food to keep it safe and fresh

question_set_2.question: To cook slowly in liquid just below boiling point.
To cook meat or fish by exposure to direct heat.
A quick process of plunging food into boiling water and then into ice-cold water to stop enzymatic action.
An infection of the digestive tract caused by contaminated food or drinks
The process of turning liquid into a solid state, often by heat, like cooking eggs.

question_set_3.question: The use of living micro-organisms to create new products with specific characteristics and attributes.

question_set_1.question: Processing a set of data preventing anyone except the recipient from reading it.

A network or system that is designed to block unauthorized access while allowing authorized communications.

question_set_2.question: A set of technologies that enable computers to perform a variety of advanced functions and simulate human intelligence.
